ctu_text: \n\n", "exclusions_md": "", "detailedDescription": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The scheme \"Kala Samman Scheme\" is implemented by the Art and Culture Department, Government of Goa, to grant financial assistance to eminent artists who are in indigent circumstances as a token of respect for their contribution to the field of Art and culture. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "block_quote", "children": [{"text": "Objectives", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "ol_list", "children": [{"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "To give financial support to the artists in indigent circumstances. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "To grant monthly financial assistance to the artists who are in indigent conditions to meet their daily needs. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "To recognize the contribution of artists in the field of Art and culture.
